Department of Electrical, Computer and Software Engineering Dr. Jing Ren Jing Ren BSc, MBA, PhD (Western), PEng Professor Department of Electrical, Computer and Software Engineering Faculty of Engineering and Applied Science Contact information 2000 Simcoe Street North Oshawa, Ontario L1G 0C5 Office: ERC 3033 905.721.8668 ext. 2865 905.721.3370 (fax) jing.ren@ontariotechu.ca Research topics Haptics and virtual reality robotics and control image processing soft computing Education MBA, Schulich Business School, York University, Canada, 2018 PhD (Electrical Engineering), University of Western Ontario, Canada, 2005 MSc (Electrical Engineering), University of Western Ontario, Canada, 2003 BSc (Electrical Engineering), Shandong University, China, 1993 Courses Discrete Mathematics Introductory Electronics Circuit Design Advanced Control Systems Advanced Image Processing Electric Circuits Introduction to Programming Intelligent Control Systems Computer Architecture Introduction to Control Systems Discrete-Time Control Systems Introduction to Engineering Research and expertise Work experience Honours and awards Robarts Research Institute, Postdoctoral Fellow, 2005-2006 Ontario Graduate Scholarship (OGS), York University, (2017-2018) Dean’s Entrance Award, Schulich Business School, York University, 2017 University Faculty Award (2006-2011) Ontario Graduate Scholarship (OGS), Western University, (2004-2005) Publications and presentations Selected publications and presentations X. Huang, J. Moore, G. Guiraudon, D. Boughner, J. Ren and T.M. Peters, “Rapid Registration of 2D Ultrasound and 3D CT Images for Surgical Guidance”, IEEE Transaction on Medical Imaging, 2008 (Accepted).
